summary: DT: THE CONTACT OWNS A 1999 CHRYSLER CONCORDE. THE TIMING CHAIN FAILED WHILE DRIVING ON AUGUST 16, 2005 , CAUSING THE ENGINE TO STALL. THE DEALERSHIP STATED THAT  THE CONTACT COULD HAVE  ENGINE REBUILT WHICH WOULD COST  $7000-8000 DOLLARS OR THEY COULD DO IT FOR $2500. THE DEALERSHIP  COULD NOT GIVE  THE CONTACT  ANY TYPE OF EXPLANATION AS TO WHY THE TIMING CHAIN FAILED. THE CURRENT MILEAGE ON VEHICLE IS  64, 200.*AK
